title: Bots in Aram
body: For the past few days, I've been playing Aram to level up my account. Every game I get into my entire team and the entire enemy team is a bot. That account is a level 29 and I also tried it on my main which is a level 80 and still got the same thing so it has nothing to do with mmr, is anyone else experiencing this?

replies.body: bots in ARAM at pre 30 accounts and early mornings to fill player spots riot won't get rid of them even if it ruins the game integrity
people level with bots in aram and sell the accounts
